alert.note: Alert for Central and Southern Valley; Daniels; Northern Valley; Western Roosevelt (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 8:27PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Daniels, northwestern Roosevelt and northeastern Valley Counties through 930 PM MDT... At 827 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles northeast of St. Marie, or 21 miles south of Opheim, moving northwest at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Opheim, Richland, Nashua, Lustre, St. Marie, Port Of Opheim, Peerless, West Fork, Volt, Baylor, Glentana and Larslan. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
